Sentece: Oral bioavailability in the fistulated sheep was only 5.5 +/- 1.8% (mean +/- SE).
Title: Plasma ronidazole concentrations in sheep after intravenous, oral, intraruminal and intraabomasal administration.

Sentece: In the non-fistulated sheep, oral biodisponibility was 2.6 +/- 0.5%.

Name: Terlipressin

Sentece: After water was restricted for 48 h before the oral ronidazole administration to these sheep, bioavailability was slightly increased (6.0 +/- 3.1%).
Title: Plasma ronidazole concentrations in sheep after intravenous, oral, intraruminal and intraabomasal administration.

Sentece: When desmopressin acetate was injected i.v. before the oral ronidazole administration, bioavailability was 10.6 +/- 6.5%.
Title: Plasma ronidazole concentrations in sheep after intravenous, oral, intraruminal and intraabomasal administration.
Name: Terlipressin

Sentece: When glypressin, another vasopressin analogue, was used, oral bioavailability was not influenced: 2.4 +/- 1.3%.
Title: Plasma ronidazole concentrations in sheep after intravenous, oral, intraruminal and intraabomasal administration.
